ttp_template:
<group name="active_role_active_software_version_current_active_unit_current_standby_unit">
  Switchovers:  {{SWITCHOVERS | ORPHRASE}}
  Last switchover reason: {{LAST_SWITCHOVER_REASON | ORPHRASE}}
  Current {{ACTIVE_ROLE}} Unit:  {{CURRENT_ACTIVE_UNIT | ORPHRASE}}
  Current {{STANDBY_ROLE}} Unit:  {{CURRENT_STANDBY_UNIT | ORPHRASE}}
  Uptime:  {{UPTIME | ORPHRASE}}
  Software Version:  {{ACTIVE_SOFTWARE_VERSION | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
High Availability Summary:
  Uptime:                 450 hours
  Switchovers:            3
  Last switchover reason: Power Failure
  Current Active Unit:    Slot 1
  Current Standby Unit:   Slot 2
  
  Active Unit Details:
    Slot:                 1
    Role:                 Active
    Uptime:               235 hours
    Software Version:     12.1(20)S

  Standby Unit Details:
    Slot:                 2
    Role:                 Standby
    Uptime:               235 hours
    Software Version:     12.1(20)S
textfsm_template:
Value UPTIME (\d+ hours)
Value SWITCHOVERS (\d+)
Value LAST_SWITCHOVER_REASON (.+)
Value CURRENT_ACTIVE_UNIT (Slot \d+)
Value CURRENT_STANDBY_UNIT (Slot \d+)
Value ACTIVE_SLOT (Slot \d+)
Value ACTIVE_ROLE (Active)
Value ACTIVE_UPTIME (\d+ hours)
Value ACTIVE_SOFTWARE_VERSION (\d+\.\d+\(\d+\)S)
Value STANDBY_SLOT (Slot \d+)
Value STANDBY_ROLE (Standby)
Value STANDBY_UPTIME (\d+ hours)
Value STANDBY_SOFTWARE_VERSION (\d+\.\d+\(\d+\)S)

Start
  ^High Availability Summary:$$
  ^\s*Uptime:\s+${UPTIME}$$
  ^\s*Switchovers:\s+${SWITCHOVERS}$$
  ^\s*Last switchover reason:\s+${LAST_SWITCHOVER_REASON}$$
  ^\s*Current Active Unit:\s+${CURRENT_ACTIVE_UNIT}$$
  ^\s*Current Standby Unit:\s+${CURRENT_STANDBY_UNIT}$$
  ^\s*Active Unit Details:$$
  ^\s*Slot:\s+${ACTIVE_SLOT}$$
  ^\s*Role:\s+${ACTIVE_ROLE}$$
  ^\s*Uptime:\s+${ACTIVE_UPTIME}$$
  ^\s*Software Version:\s+${ACTIVE_SOFTWARE_VERSION}$$
  ^\s*Standby Unit Details:$$
  ^\s*Slot:\s+${STANDBY_SLOT}$$
  ^\s*Role:\s+${STANDBY_ROLE}$$
  ^\s*Uptime:\s+${STANDBY_UPTIME}$$
  ^\s*Software Version:\s+${STANDBY_SOFTWARE_VERSION}$$
